attributes.action: Support our Troops and give them more equipment that they need
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My petition is in support of the Troops in Afghanistan. Basically I think that the troops need alot more support from the Government and also they need alot more equipment to carry out operations successfully.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
